verses.text: Brothers, \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*’s \w desire|strong="G2107"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prayer|strong="G1162"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Israelites \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G1063"\w* \w testify|strong="G3140"\w* \w about|strong="G2596"\w* \w them|strong="G3754"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G3754"\w* \w are|strong="G3748"\w* \w zealous|strong="G2205"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w but|strong="G1063"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w on|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G2596"\w* \w basis|strong="G2596"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w*.

\w Because|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* ignorant \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w establish|strong="G2476"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w submit|strong="G5293"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w end|strong="G5056"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w bring|strong="G1519"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w everyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w believes|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w concerning|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w writes|strong="G1125"\w*: “\w The|strong="G1722"\w* \w man|strong="G4160"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w does|strong="G4160"\w* \w these|strong="G4160"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w will|strong="G4160"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.”\f + \fr 10:5 \ft Leviticus 18:5; see also Ezekiel 20:11, 13, and 21.\f*

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w*: “\w Do|strong="G5101"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G1722"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, ‘\w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w will|strong="G5101"\w* \w ascend|strong="G1537"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*?’\f + \fr 10:6 \ft Deuteronomy 30:12\f* (\w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w bring|strong="G2609"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w down|strong="G2609"\w*)

\w or|strong="G2228"\w*, ‘\w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w will|strong="G5101"\w* \w descend|strong="G2597"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* Abyss?’\f + \fr 10:7 \ft See Deuteronomy 30:13.\f* (\w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w bring|strong="G1519"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*).”

\w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w does|strong="G1510"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*? “\w The|strong="G1722"\w* \w word|strong="G4487"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w near|strong="G1451"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*; \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*,”\f + \fr 10:8 \ft Deuteronomy 30:14\f* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w*, \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w word|strong="G4487"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w we|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w proclaiming|strong="G2784"\w*:

\w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w confess|strong="G3670"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*, “\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*,” \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w with|strong="G1519"\w* \w your|strong="G1161"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w you|strong="G4100"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w are|strong="G1519"\w* justified, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w with|strong="G1519"\w* \w your|strong="G1161"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \w you|strong="G4100"\w* \w confess|strong="G3670"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w are|strong="G1519"\w* \w saved|strong="G4991"\w*.

\w It|strong="G1063"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w just|strong="G3588"\w* \w as|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Scripture|strong="G1124"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w*: “\w Anyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w believes|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w will|strong="G3956"\w* \w never|strong="G3756"\w* \w be|strong="G3756"\w* \w put|strong="G2617"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w shame|strong="G2617"\w*.”\f + \fr 10:11 \ft Isaiah 28:16 (see also LXX)\f*

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w difference|strong="G1293"\w* \w between|strong="G5037"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Greek|strong="G1672"\w*: \w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w same|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* gives richly \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w call|strong="G1941"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*,

\w for|strong="G1063"\w*, “\w Everyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w calls|strong="G1941"\w* \w on|strong="G1941"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w of|strong="G3686"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w will|strong="G3739"\w* \w be|strong="G3956"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*.”\f + \fr 10:13 \ft Joel 2:32\f*

\w How|strong="G4459"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w can|strong="G4459"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w call|strong="G1941"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w One|strong="G3739"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w have|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w can|strong="G4459"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w One|strong="G3739"\w* \w of|strong="G1519"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w have|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* heard? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w can|strong="G4459"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* hear \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w someone|strong="G3739"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w preach|strong="G2784"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w can|strong="G4459"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w preach|strong="G2784"\w* \w unless|strong="G1437"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w sent|strong="G1125"\w*? \w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w it|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*: “\w How|strong="G4459"\w* \w beautiful|strong="G5611"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w bring|strong="G2097"\w* \w good|strong="G2097"\w* \w news|strong="G2097"\w*!”\f + \fr 10:15 \ft Literally good news of good things; BYZ and TR How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news of peace, who bring good news of good things; Isaiah 52:7\f*

\w But|strong="G1063"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* welcomed \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G3956"\w* \w news|strong="G2098"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="G2268"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w has|strong="G2962"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w our|strong="G3956"\w* message?”\f + \fr 10:16 \ft Isaiah 53:1\f*

Consequently, \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* comes \w by|strong="G1223"\w* hearing, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* hearing \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1537"\w* \w word|strong="G4487"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w ask|strong="G3004"\w*, \w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* hear? \w Indeed|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G2532"\w*: “\w Their|strong="G2532"\w* \w voice|strong="G5353"\w* \w has|strong="G2532"\w* \w gone|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w words|strong="G4487"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w ends|strong="G4009"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w world|strong="G3625"\w*.”\f + \fr 10:18 \ft Psalms 19:4 (see also LXX)\f*

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w ask|strong="G3004"\w* instead, \w did|strong="G1097"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w understand|strong="G1097"\w*? \w First|strong="G4413"\w*, \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w*: “\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G1473"\w* \w make|strong="G3863"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w jealous|strong="G3863"\w* \w by|strong="G1909"\w* \w those|strong="G1097"\w* \w who|strong="G3756"\w* \w are|strong="G1484"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w a|strong="G1909"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w*; \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G1473"\w* \w make|strong="G3863"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* angry \w by|strong="G1909"\w* \w a|strong="G1909"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w* \w without|strong="G3361"\w* understanding.”\f + \fr 10:19 \ft Deuteronomy 32:21 (see also LXX)\f*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="G2268"\w* boldly \w says|strong="G3004"\w*: “\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* \w Me|strong="G1473"\w*; \w I|strong="G1473"\w* revealed \w Myself|strong="G1473"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w ask|strong="G1905"\w* \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w Me|strong="G1473"\w*.”\f + \fr 10:20 \ft Isaiah 65:1\f*

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w*: “\w All|strong="G3650"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w long|strong="G2250"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* held \w out|strong="G2532"\w* \w My|strong="G1473"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* disobedient \w and|strong="G2532"\w* obstinate \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.”\f + \fr 10:21 \ft Isaiah 65:2 (see also LXX)\f*
